product.longDescription: A vigorous grower producing a medium-length white shank and contrasting, very dark blue-green foliage. Holds in the field for fall/winter harvest, and overwinters in moderate climates. Moderate leaf disease resistance. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 10,600 seeds/oz. Packet: 250 seeds.

Tadorna Organic Leek Seed

Product ID:2092G.542092G

A vigorous grower producing a medium-length white shank and contrasting, very dark blue-green foliage. Holds in the field for fall/winter harvest, and overwinters in moderate climates. Moderate leaf disease resistance. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 10,600 seeds/oz. Packet: 250 seeds.
